name: Erica Social Token
description: EST is social $ that will integrate the interactions and activities stemming from my community. As a community builder who has consistently tried to bridge the gap between regions and players through a variety of activities, I believe that the community has grown enough to create value and that community supporters need a way of being incentivized. Many useful cases in which you can use $EST will be created and announced in the upcoming months. You can use $EST in finding talent in Web3, getting access to events hosted by KryptoSeoul, getting access to exclusive content for $EST holders, scheduling exclusive meetings with Erica Kang, etc.
